notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: The list of authors contributed to this work as follows: X.S. was in charge of the harvest and selection of the experimental material. A.D. was responsible for the preparation of the material, extraction, chemical analysis, and bioactivities screening assay of the essential oils. H.L. and J.L. were responsible for antioxidant activity assay of vetiver oil. P.L. performed antimicrobial activity assay. G.D. and F.W. were responsible for the interpretation of the results and editing of manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
